synopsis.text: The second season of this mysterious adventure anime continues the journey to uncover secrets of an advanced ancient civilization. Proof of their existence is scattered across the world, sparking intense interest from some who seek the truth. We follow a cast of characters as they embark on globe-trotting expeditions, confronting peril and the unknown in their quest to learn more. Their path crosses with mystical organizations and sinister factions who also vie for insight on these prehistoric people. With the stakes raised even higher, our adventurers must navigate deepening mysteries and tests of courage. The dead seemingly return to life, defying rational explanation. Yet new discoveries await those brave and clever enough to survive. Will forbidden knowledge from eons past be revealed? Or will darkness triumph over those trying to illuminate our distant past? The thrilling unknown continues to unfold.
synopsis.author: anthropic.claude-v2:1
